thread.title: Ghana defender Baba Rahman set to stay on Chelsea bench as Mourinho keeps faith with Ivanovic
thread.title_full: Ghana defender Baba Rahman set to stay on Chelsea bench as Mourinho keeps faith with Ivanovic

title: Ghana defender Baba Rahman set to stay on Chelsea bench as Mourinho keeps faith with Ivanovic
text:
19:40 CET Ghana defender Baba Rahman set to stay on Chelsea bench as Mourinho keeps faith with Ivanovic - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana defender Baba Rahman is set for a long spell on the Chelsea bench after coach Jose Mourinho revealed he will keep faith in Branislav Ivanovic at right-back. 
The Portuguese manager says he is critical of the Serbian defender but wonâ€™t drop him in favour of the Ghana left-back. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
